Posts.Content: Hello out there, I have recently had a lumpectomy and lymph nodes removed and am now scheduled to have a mastectomy and reconsturction at the same time. The reconstruction option I have chosen and which my surgeon agrees is suitable for me is the saline implant. I would just like some views from anyone who has had this surgery. I am having the mastectomy and reconstruction done at the same time because I think it is better to get it over with and have one recovery period from both - am I being over optimistic - should I be considering one step at a time ie mastectomy first, then reconstruction after a few months? Am very confused - please tell me your experiences. Thanks allic52
Posts.Title: mastectomy/reconstruction 1 2

Posts.Content: Hi Terry Thanks for your kind words. Please tell me how long it took to recover from the mastectomy - how soon were you able to resume work/everyday stuff? How donyou feel now generally? Thanks veery much Allic
Posts.Title: mastectomy/reconstruction 1 2

Posts.Content: Hi Terry Thanks very much for your explanation - it makes it all a lot clearer to me. I have been told by my doctor that the recovery will take up to 6 weeks. Will take your advice and exercise and eat healthy and be very positive about everything. Thanks Allic

Posts.Content: Hi Lucy, Fear is normal, but prayer can overcome that fear. Pray and I will pray for you too. I have been through the waiting and am now waiting again to have my second op and reconstruction. Have prayed throughout and have found solace and great strength in that. God bless allic52
